subject: Attention Sir/Ma,
body:
Attention Sir/Ma,
The Israeliâ€“Palestinian conflict is an ongoing military and political conflict in the Levant. Beginning in the mid-20th century, it is one of the world's longest continuing conflicts. The Israeli army ordered all residents of Gaza City to evacuate their homes and move to the south.
We are the innocent people of Gaza Palestinian who camp in the neighboring country without food, water, home and medication are seeking your help and no amount is too small. We really need your help and you can do whichever amount you wish and we will appreciate it.
You can send any amount you wish to the below Bitcoin Wallet (BTC ADDRESS)
Here is the BTC ADDRESS ( bc1qu34n69d7s7katjgvvej85fctrrg3tua2vze4s4 ) where you can send any amount you wish to support us with Food, water and meditations. send only Bitcoin (BTC) to this address.
Here is email address where you can notify us: 
ahmadabuwalid@aol.com
Best Regards,
Ahmad Abu Walid.

subject: Re: Attention Sir/Ma,
body:
Hello Ahmad Abu Walid,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information about the situation in Gaza. It's truly heartbreaking to hear about the struggles that innocent people are facing there. I'm really sorry to hear about your current circumstances.

Could you please tell me more about how these donations are being used? Are they directly converted into food, water, and medication for the people in need? Also, is there an organization or group that oversees these donations?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Tonya
